A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I loved this movie. It did so much I was hoping for a Star Wars movie to do. If you're wondering why the Audience Score is so low\, there is actually a movement on social media to discredit this movie because there are hateful\, childish people who think this is an important mission or something. Don't trust the audience score\, trust your instinct. It's a beautifully written Star Wars film.
